trends: There has been one other sighting in Rygge
There were no other sightings in Rygge on or around January 28th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsJanuary 28,2012,at 8-9 AM,dark outside.I was just got out for my first cig in the morning,then i saw a triangel-shaped object flew towards north.The object had three faint red lights in each corner,no sound.The object looked grayish and almost transparent.It was right above me in tree height,about 15-20 meters above the ground.
Summary: Triangel shaped object fly right over my house.
